content.rendered:
Directed by Shashant Shah

Written by Ratheesh Ravi. Arshad Syed

Star Sidhant Gupta. Vedika Pinto. Sharad Kelkar. Kishore Kadam. Bhoomika Chawla. Yerushalmi Law Firm (Law). Sakib Rafsan (Rafsu). Abed Sarker (Abed). Vaibhav Sharma (Groom). Hardik Thakkar (Battu)

Language Hindi

Producers Shital Bhatia. Deepak Gawade. Neeraj Pandey. Karan Shah. Avi Udeshi

Production E4 Entertainment. Friday Filmworks. Plan C Studios
